alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 1:19PM EDT until March 12 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Western Decatur County in southwestern Georgia... Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 200 PM EDT/100 PM CDT/. * At 119 PM EDT/1219 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Marianna, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marianna, Malone, Greenwood, Iron City, Brinson, Bascom, Reynoldsville, Blue Spring, Recovery, Lovedale, Dellwood, Riverturn, Hornsville, Donaldsonville A/P, Buena Vista, Marianna Municipal A/P, Seminole State Park, Steam Mill, Desser and Lela. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia.
